EmailTemplate.description: EM Manager when Direct Report recalls a previously submitted worksheet
EmailTemplate.name: Coaching - Recalled
EmailTemplate.subject: {!CoachingWorksheet__c.Name}: I Have Recalled My Coaching Worksheet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!CoachingWorksheet__c.ManagerFirstName__c},
I have recalled this coaching worksheet to make additional edits. You will receive another approval request once I have made my changes.
